definition: A team sport played on a rectangular court, typically indoors, involving two teams of players who try to score points by throwing a ball through a hoop elevated above the ground at each end of the court. It is commonly played with a round, inflated ball and is a popular recreational activity as well as a professional sport.

examples.german: Basketball ist ein beliebter Sport in Deutschland.
examples.english: Basketball is a popular sport in Germany.

examples.german: Ich spiele gerne Basketball in meiner Freizeit.
examples.english: I enjoy playing basketball in my free time.

examples.german: Die Basketballmannschaft hat das Spiel gewonnen.
examples.english: The basketball team won the game.

examples.german: Basketball wird oft in Schulen als Schulsport angeboten.
examples.english: Basketball is often offered as a school sport in schools.

examples.german: Mein Bruder ist ein professioneller Basketballspieler.
examples.english: My brother is a professional basketball player.
